ided me. I was lost, but feel I can now move in the right direction now.

Mike Edwards Cary, NC
 
bhali333 <paranormalinvestigating@...> w=
rote:


Frank R.I agree 100% with what you have stated, it's just that when=
 I decided to come back to this group. I started to read the posts from the=
 new people I did not recognize and it seemed they where floundering around=
 with no direction what so ever.My goal is not to preach but to teach. If I=
 come off somewhat condescending I apologise.I believe that Mike E. took my=
 advice and opinion in a positive way.If you read his earlier response to m=
y original post. he seemed more than satisfied.I Know now that I am back I =
do not want to regurgitate old grievance's. So I will take every response a=
s constructive criticism.thanks frankBruce--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, F=
rank Ratka <warrior18eii@...> wrote:>> Very well said, Misty. I had a whole=
 thing typed out and then read your responses. I would like to add that I b=
elieve it is very important to learn basic methods to develop a good ear an=
d information discipline. There is also a lot said for letting people figur=
e some things out on their own. It gives them a sense of owning the informa=
tion instead of borrowing it from person to person. Develop their own sense=
 of style and personality if you will.> > Regards,> > Frank R.> > ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----> From: Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...>> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogr=
oups.com> Sent: Wednesday, March 19, 2008 12:12:52 PM> Subject: Re: [EVP-IT=
C] Re: for mike E. and other new people> > > I find some like certain metho=
ds better to make thier voice. And often they will state thier approval or =
disapproval for the method I am experimenting with. A few do not like music=
 method they say its too much noise they cant get a word in edgewise, yet o=
thers enjoy it and make use of it with ease speaking very loud over the mus=
ic notes. For water method nobody complains (i dont know why) and for sweep=
 methods, only a few seem to have trouble using it to form thier words.> > =
Perhaps it has to do with vibrational frequencies I dont know. Once the lin=
es are open and communication is flowing it gets interesting to say the lea=
st =3D)> > Just experiment and find whats working best for you personally.>=
 > Misty> > Nellie Kampmann <rednellie@gmail. com> wrote:> This is an inter=
esting conversation. Personally, I use my hack to> communicate with a spiri=
t who is definitely grounded. Sometimes the> communications come through as=
 bits of radio waves put together to> form words or sentences, and other ti=
mes, they sound more like> traditional evps. One of the little things I'm t=
rying to figure out> is why I could never get evps from him after a year of=
 trying, but he> has taken to communicating through the box like a fish to =
water.> > Nellie> > > > > > Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all =
